attributes.action: Launch a full and independent enquiry into the allegations against Jimmy Saville.
attributes.additional_details: Following the significant number of recent allegations concerning the late Jimmy Saville this e-petition has been set up with the intention of uncovering the truth in relation to this. A knighted and privileged former public figure should be posthumously investigated in the light of such significant allegations. The enquiry should be independent of any individuals/associations/public bodies who have been directly or indirectly associated with Jimmy Saville during his life.
